post.body: hee, people thought you bought a cadillac? Gala, put some d's on that bitch!!
YA RLY
So terrifying. Hold me, my dear.
Hee, love your new picture!
Aww, you're in my hometown-area!
You're SUCH a bad person. The computer is just fine, thankyouverymuch!
Me too! I was certain it would be terrible, but ended up loving it. It's just so ..... ridiculous! Check it out, for real.
Sadly, I am PS3less. I am just a bucket of lamesauce today!
Hahaha. Oh, Donnie Darko!
By netspeak of course I mean shit like U and whatnot. Blah.
Seriously. Who uses netspeak anymore? Are you fucking kidding me? Haven't we reached a point where netspeak instantly equals dumb?
My computer just made a hideously loud beep and poor Tesla jumped about six feet in the air. Sorry, kitty.
#magpie My new addiction: http://is.gd/dTzI
The Spirit was such a mess, and yet so deliciously campy & pretty. One of those so bad it's AWESOME movies.
"Whatcha doing?" "I'm punching gorillas in the face, how about you?"
Finally going to get The Dark Knight today. Very excited! Sad that no stores around here have Persona 4, though ... LAME.
Also, why does this dragon have a goatee? This game is so fucking amazing.
Come here, you poor sweet innocent little forest creature ... feel the sting of my blaaaaaade~
I have just slaughtered an entire forest's worth of deer in search of "the perfect antler" - Oh, Warcraft!
Fuck yeah, Folgers!!
